Description.Text: Set between Basingstoke and Farnborough near Hook, alongside the picturesque Basingstoke Canal. The hotel is located just 2 minutes from the M3 and offers free Wi-Fi, Free Parking, canoeing and fishing activities nearby plus an onsite Thai Restaurant which serves freshly prepared authentic food, good quality real ale and an extensive wine list. The hotel has no smoking policy. The hotel offers free breakfast to its guests.

There are many interesting things to do whilst in the area; a canal cruise, family outing or trip to the races. Other attractions include Wellington Country Park, Basingstoke Canal Cruises, Watercress Line, Rural Life Centre, Jane Austen Museum, Alice Holtforest, Birdworld and Underwater World, Crown Service Gliding Club, Farnborough Air Show, Ascot Race Course, Legoland, Thorpe Park, Chessington World of Adventure and Stonehenge.
